# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="8e62e-102">Organisere e-post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e62e-103">I Outlook på nettet kan du bruke kommandoer som **Opprydding** og **Flytt til** for å slette eller flytte meldinger automatisk fra en bestemt avsender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-103">In Outlook on the web, you can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e62e-104">Disse kommandoene vises over meldings listen når du velger en melding i innboksen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8e62e-105">**Opprydding**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8e62e-106">lar deg raskt slette meldinger i innboksen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8e62e-107">Du kan automatisk slette all inn kommende e-post fra avsenderen, beholde bare den nyeste e-posten og slette resten, eller slette e-post som er eldre enn 10 dager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8e62e-108">**Flytt til**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="8e62e-109">lar deg flytte en melding til en bestemt melding til en annen mappe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8e62e-110">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se [arbeide med meldings mapper i Outlook på nettet](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8e62e-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
